system.description: You call forth a mass of centipede swarms (one per two caster levels, max 10 at 20th level), which need not appear adjacent. You may summon them so they share the area of other creatures. The swarms remain stationary, attacking creatures in their area, unless you command them to move (standard action). As a standard action you can command any number of swarms to move toward prey within 100 ft. You cannot command any swarm to move more than 100 ft. from you; if you move more than 100 ft. from a swarm, it remains stationary but can be commanded again if you return within 100 ft.
system.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); 100 ft. to command
system.target: One swarm of centipedes per two levels
